lead_paragraph: The Trump Taj Mahal, a casino hotel in New Jersey's struggling Atlantic City gambling hub, could stay open for all of 2015 with a $20 million financing package from investor Carl Icahn, lawyers for Trump Entertainment Resorts said on Monday.

headline.main: Icahn's Money Could Keep Atlantic City Casino Open Another Year: Lawyer
headline.print_headline: Icahn's Money Could Keep Atlantic City Casino Open Another Year: Lawyer
